newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: SOCCER-DUTCH REFEREES CALL OFF PLANNED STRIKE OVER PAY.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-DUTCH REFEREES CALL OFF PLANNED STRIKE OVER PAY.

text.p: Dutch soccer referees called off a strike planned for later this month after the soccer union (KNVB) offered improved terms, news agency ANP said on Tuesday.
Referees had threatened to go on strike and wipe out a week's entire first division programme unless the KNVB increased match fees, pension rights and other payments.
ANP said the KNVB had made a move towards the referees but details of the improved terms were not disclosed.
